desc:
- Worked on several bug fixes.
- Analyzed the identified slow queries and their respective scenarios. Introduced MongoDB indexes to improve the performance.
- Connected with several customers to analyze & debug the reported issues.

- Added new node called 'RemoteLookup' Node which pulls data from third-party APIs and presents options to the user.
- Worked on several bugs. Added multiple MongoDB/NodeJS scripts to correct improper production data.

- Worked on a new product called 'Process Assistant' from scratch. This helps users automate business processes.
- Added new features 'Digital Views & Forms' which enable better user experience in the Virtual Assistants.
